verses.name: Hebrews 3:5
verses.text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;

verses.name: Hebrews 3:6
verses.text: But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.

verses.name: Hebrews 3:7
verses.text: Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, To day if ye will hear his voice,

verses.name: Hebrews 3:8
verses.text: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

verses.name: Hebrews 3:9
verses.text: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my works forty years.
